articles.author: Jonathan Healy in London
articles.title: David Warner announces end date on Test career - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Australia opener David Warner has put an end date on his long and prosperous Test career by declaring he plans to retire from Test cricket during the upcoming Australian summer.
articles.content: Australia opener David Warner has put an end date on his long and prosperous Test career by declaring he plans to retire from Test cricket during the upcoming Australian summer.Warner is currently in… [+3249 chars]

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: ‘If India are to win WTC final, he has to step up…’: Ponting on Rohit's weapon - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ricky Ponting said Mohammed Shami has to take his game to a different level if India want to win the WTC final by beating Australia. | Cricket
articles.content: Naming India's two lead seamers for the World Test Championship (WTC) final is one of the easiest tasks. It's literally a no-brainer to predict that Mohammed Shami and Mohammed Siraj will be India's … [+2213 chars]
